üåÖ Details: braneshop.com.au

Intended Audience:

Programmers, data scientists, analysts, and anyone interested in hands-on programming experience building deep learning networks. You will need to be comfortable programming in Python.

Workshop Breakdown:
  • Python
  • ~ TensorFlow
  • ~ Jupyter Notebooks
  • ~ Google Colaboratory

Day 1 - Fundamentals: Deep Learning, Learning Theory, Convolutions, Embeddings.

A solid base by covering key concepts through group learning and exercises.

Attendees will implement a reference model in TensorFlow, and learn the necessary components of all deep learning training pipelines.

Day 2 - Hands-On TensorFlow: TensorBoard, Training, Evaluation.

Work through the details of training models in TensorFlow. We will build a reference model, learn how to train it, check it's progress, and evaluate it's accuracy.

Day 3 - Group Projects.

Hands-on experience in deep learning model development, using TensorFlow.

Consolidate learning by working in small groups on independent projects. Project options vary across image processing, embeddings, and generative models.

Questions you'll be able to answer after taking this workshop:
  • How does deep learning differ from machine learning and regular programming?
  • How do you build deep learning models in TensorFlow?
  • What are some common deep learning architectures, and how can I apply them?
  • How do I build a good data set for training? How much data do I need?
  • How do I process text with deep learning? What about images? What about both, jointly?!

Braneshop is located on the traditional lands of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin nation. We acknowledge that sovereignty was never ceded and pay our respects to elders past, present and emerging.
